exploreUrl:
全部小说::/list/{{page}}.html
玄幻魔法::/list/1-{{page}}.html
仙侠修真::/list/2-{{page}}.html
都市言情::/list/3-{{page}}.html
历史军事::/list/4-{{page}}.html
网游动漫::/list/5-{{page}}.html
科幻小说::/list/6-{{page}}.html
恐怖灵异::/list/7-{{page}}.html
其它类型::/list/8-{{page}}.html

bookSourceGroup: 🍿 日常,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '精品榜',
    '人气榜',
    '推荐榜',
    '黑马榜',
    '新更新',
    '新漫画'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/rank/${parseInt(i)+1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
sort = [
    '冒险','热血','都市','玄幻','悬疑','耽美','恋爱','生活',
    '搞笑','穿越','修真','后宫','女主','古风','连载','完结'
];
for (i in sort) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/sort/${parseInt(i)+1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(sort[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (sort.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (sort.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36 EdgA/127.0.0.0",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>
loginUi:
[
  { name: "激活码：", type: "text" },
  { name: "代理：", type: "text" },
  {
    name: "            💡　　 源　　 站　　 测　　 试　　 💡            ",
    type: "button",
    action: "test(1)"
  },
  { name: "  查看当前  ", type: "button", action: "look(0)" },
  { name: "   查看历史   ", type: "button", action: "look(1)" },
  { name: "  恢复默认  ", type: "button", action: "test(-1)" },
  { name: "  繁体搜索  ", type: "button", action: "search_TC()" },
  { name: "   繁简转换   ", type: "button", action: "TC_to_SC()" },
  { name: "  目录整理  ", type: "button", action: "settle()" },
  {
    name: "            💡　　 源　　 站　　 打　　 印　　 💡            ",
    type: "button",
    action: "test()"
  }
]

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
eval(String(source.loginUrl)); var Headers = String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl)); var Option = { "method": "GET", "headers": Headers }; if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); var $2 = element => String(java.getElements(element).text()); var $3 = element => String(J.select(element).attr('data-src')); url = baseUrl; s = $2('.detinfo span:contains(态：)').replace(/.*态：\s*/, '').replace(/[中已]/g, ''); k = $2('.detinfo span:contains(签：)').replace(/.*签：\s*/, '').replace(/\s/g, ','); t = $2('.detinfo span:contains(更新时间：)').replace(/更新时间：\s*/, '').replace(/[年月]/g, '-').replace(/日/g, ''); l = $2('ul a.0'); l = String(l); l = Get('settle') == true ? l.replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, l.match(/\d+/) ? l.match(/(\d+)/)[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : l; Setting = '\n📌当前源站：' + (Get('ci0') == 0 ? '〖默认〗' : '〖自选〗') + x[Get('ci0')] + (Get('url').length > 26 ? Get('url').substring(0, 26) + "
" + Get('url').substring(26) : Get('url')) + ('\n🔍繁体搜索：' + (Get('search_TC') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')) + ('\n📑繁简转换：' + (Get('TC_to_SC') == true ? '〖默认〗开启' : '〖自选〗关闭')) + ('\n🗃目录整理：' + (Get('settle') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')); changeLog = '\nㅤ\nㅤ\n' + Setting + '\nㅤ\n'; book = JSON.stringify({ 'name': $2('.name_mh'), 'author': $2('.detinfo span:contains(者：)').replace(/.*者：\s*/, '').replace(/[、，,·+&]|\sx\s/g, '/').replace(/\s*\/\s*/g, '/').replace(/\/+/g, '/').replace(/（/g, '(').replace(/）/g, ')'), 'kind': s + ',' + k, 'word': '', 'latest': l + '〔' + t + '〕', 'intro': (t != '' ? ('更新时间：' + t + '\nㅤ\n') : '') + $2('.content').replace(/(^)/g, '$1
') + changeLog, 'cover': $3('.himg img'), 'url': url, 'durl': '', 'reName': true }); } else { (function Book() { apiBaseUrl = cache.get(java.md5Encode16('cache_api_' + Get('url'))); json = java.ajax(apiBaseUrl); Title = JSON.parse(json)['title']; Intro = cache.get(java.md5Encode16('User' + Get('url'))) == 'y' ? JSON.parse(json)['intro1'] : JSON.parse(json)['intro']; return { Title: Title, Intro: Intro }; }()); book = JSON.stringify({ 'kind': book['kind'], 'latest': Title[Title.length - 1], 'intro': Intro[0] }); } Put(book);

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
User = Checkwait(User);
if (User == true) {
    var list = java.getElements('.likedata');
    for (i in list) {
        data.push({
            'name': list[i].select('.le-t').text(),
            'author': String(list[i].select('p')[1].text()).replace(/作者：/,'').replace(/[、，,·+&]|\sx\s/g, '/').replace(/\s*\/\s*/g, '/').replace(/\/+/g, '/').replace(/（/g, '(').replace(/）/g, ')'),
            'kind': '',
            'word': '',
            'latest': String(list[i].select('p')[2].text()).replace(/最新：/,''),
            'intro': list[i].select('.le-j').text(),
            'cover': list[i].select('img').attr('data-src'),
            'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('a').attr('href')
        });
    }
    Data();
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") {
    var list = java.getElements('ul a');
    date = String(java.getElements('.detinfo span:contains(更新时间：)').text()).replace(/更新时间：\s*/, '').replace(/[年月]/g, '-').replace(/日/g, '');
    for (i in list) {
        title = list[i].select('a').text();
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s共.*?图/, '').replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        data.push({
            'title': i == 0 ? title + '〔' + date + '〕' : title,
            'link': Get('url') + list[i].select('a').attr('href') + ',{"webView":true}'
        });
    }
    url = Get('url') + '/morechapter,{"body":"id=' + baseUrl.replace(/^.*\/(.*)\/$/,'$1') + '","method":"POST"}';
    list1 = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data;
    for (i in list1) {
        title = list1[i].chaptername;
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s共.*?图/, '').replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        data.push({
            'title': title,
            'link': baseUrl + list1[i].chapterid + '.html,{"webView":true}'
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data.reverse());
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    var body = 'k=' + java.encodeURI(e);
    return Get('url') + '/s,{"body":"' + body + '","method":"POST"}';
}(key));
</js>

bookSourceComment: 第一次搜有DDOS验证，重新搜索一次就行了。

bookSourceComment:

i:"[property$=image]@content",
o:"[property$=description]@content",
g:"[property$=update_time]@content",
m:"baseUrl"
}
